Instructions: AI Agent Foundry uses this name for recognition. :plotly: is a special name that is used for rendering a Plotly chart.
Enter a name for the function. Agent refers to this name.
Describe how you like the function to be used

Custom: JSON Schema can be defined
Artifact: Choose an appropriate type

Description: JSON schema of the output data structure. The agent creates output following the definition.
Instructions: Use this if the output must be persisted as an individual object from chat conversations. The form type interface supports only Artifact type output to render the output
Notes: If Custom is selected on Output Type

Instructions:
Text: This should be used for text-based generated content
Image: This should be used for Image content
React: This should be used for React code output. The React code will be executed as an output. Typical use case is to render a dashboard. In the react code, Plotly.js and Tailwind.css can be used.
Notes: If Artifact is selected on Output Type
